Mobile Security 101 

- Buy Android phones from vendors who issue patches
- Use 2FA
- Use a passcode
- Use a password manager
- Set short timeout for lock screen
- Avoid public WiFi
- Avoid public USB charging, use AC outlets
- Stick to Play/AppStore apps
- Encrypt your device
